title: Where can I get my money back? Seriously can't even link it to my tv with a usbc-Hdmi cable ripoff!
content: Wow is all I have to say. This phone cost so much money and simply can't even link to my tv with a usbc to HDMI cord. Wish I would have known that before I went and spent $45 on an adapter!! This is the biggest let down so far with this phone! Wish I still had my s8 edge compared to this phone
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 3 XL
